song.englishname: Everyone Looks So Good From Here

english.segment1: In a deep breath it all starts to change. Flip my world inside out, honestly I like it better this way. When I mesh the night through the back of my eyes
english.segment2: I have put myself here. I'm the culprit. I am the culprit
english.segment3: I've been swallowed alive. Shut down. Building from the inside out. I can finally walk through the walls
english.segment4: I swear I've been slipped right through the cracks in the floor. It's so easy when it's pulling me under
english.segment5: Now I can see things from the outside, and I will sit here with no place. In mind
english.segment6: I can't escape from this place, this is so unfamiliar to me
english.segment7: I can hear the unsatisfying silence. My mouth is open but none of you can hear me
